title: The AI in a Box is a Rockchip-powered offline and open-source LLM device
description: Last month, CrowdSupply introduced the AI in a Box which is described as a compact, locally hosted AI solution designed to provide responsive interactions in a secure environment. This standalone device requires no internet connection, accounts, setup, or subscriptions. Useful Sensors indicates that this device is built around the RockChip 3588S SoC with 8GB DRAM […]
